title: is Duskblade of Draktharr a good item for Thresh?
body:
Current Duskblade:
\*  High AD, and nightfall will help your ADC execute people in lane.

New Duskblade:
\* Free fucking ward clearing every 90 seconds.
\* 80 true damage **_EVERY_** time you walk into the lane brush if the wards are cleared.

Both Duskblades:
\* Mobility for hooks/roams/ward clearing.
\* Helps you execute the cannon minions even if your ADC has tons of items and is trying to deny them. (This is the original reason I was looking it up)
